detected_errors.description: More than 50% of rooms/spaces from the 2D plan are missing in the 3D render (bedrooms 2–4, activity room, balcony, bath/WC cluster/corridor layout not represented).
Overall layout does not match the 2D plan; the 3D render depicts a different program (open living/kitchen + garage/car) inconsistent with the provided plan.

summary: Although the second image is a genuine 3D cutaway, it does not correspond to the provided 2D floor plan and omits most rooms, so it is rejected.
